articles.title: Airbus upbeat on Indian aviation, sees need for 2,840 new planes and 41,000 pilots in next 20 years | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Airbus India and South Asia president and managing director Rémi Maillard says India will also need 47,000 technical staff in the next 20 years
articles.content: Airbus India and South Asia president and managing director Rémi Maillard on Thursday said India will need 2,840 new aircraft and 41,000 pilots as well as 47,000 technical staff in the next 20 years.… [+2573 chars]

articles.title: Initial Upper Palaeolithic material culture by 45,000 years ago at Shiyu in northern China - Nature.com
articles.description: The authors report an Initial Upper Palaeolithic archaeological assemblage from China dating to 45,000 years ago that includes blade technology, tanged and hafted projectile points, long-distance obsidian transfer and the use of a perforated graphite disc.
